sentence.Network_en: " Perhaps you know best about that, but I should say -- But that would be ungallant.
sentence.Network_cn: " 关于这一点,你也许知道得最清楚, 不过我应当说 -- 不过那是不客气的.

list.abs: ungainly 不雅地, ungalled 未受伤的, ungainly 难看地

auth_sentence.content: It is sexist, retrogressive, mean-spirited and ungallant, and reflects very poorly on us as a nation.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is sexist, retrogressive, mean-spirited and ungallant, and reflects very poorly on us as a nation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is sexist, retrogressive, mean-spirited and ungallant, and reflects very poorly on us as a nation.
